text: James "Jim" Florentine (born August 18, 1964) is an American stand-up comedian, actor, puppeteer, voice artist, and comedian, best known as the voice of Special Ed and Bobby Fletcher in Crank Yankers. ==Early life== Florentine was born James Florentine in Brooklyn, New York on August 18, 1964. ==Other websites== * Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:American stand-up comedians Category:American puppeteers Category:American voice actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Brooklyn Category:American Internet celebrities Category:Comedians from New York City
title: Jim Florentine
